verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Under His wings, under His wings, Who from His love can sever? Under His wings my soul shall abide, Safely abide forever.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Under His wings, what a refuge in sorrow! How the heart yearningly turns to His rest! Often when earth has no balm for my healing, There I find comfort and there I am blessed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Under His wings, O what precious enjoyment! There will I hide till life’s trials are o’er; Sheltered, protected, no evil can harm me, Resting in Jesus I’m safe evermore.
